parameters.name: cluster_id
parameters.description: (string) The cluster about which to retrieve information.

401.description: The request does not have valid authentication credentials for the operation.

403.description: Caller does not have permission to execute the specified operation.

404.description: Operation was performed on a resource that does not exist.

get.description: Retrieves the information for a cluster given its identifier. Clusters can be described while they are running, or up to 60 days after they are terminated.
